data.title: Eau Claire's Reverb Music Festival
data.meta_description: Buy your tickets and start planning your trip to Eau Claire for the city's new music festival, Reverb, featuring headliners T.I. and Yellowcard on August 16-17, 2024.
data.text:
Reverb Music Festival

Save The Date: August 16-17, 2024!

Welcome to Reverb, the music festival that brings together the best of emo, pop, rock, alternative, hip-hop, and punk genres for an experience that echoes long after the festival is over. Reverb is a two-day event on August 16-17, 2024 featuring bands like T.I., Yung Joc, Yellowcard Story Of The Year, and more in Eau Claire, Wisconsin at the Eau Claire Event District.

Just as reverb creates a sense of depth and space in recordings, Reverb creates a lasting impact on our attendees through the power of music and connection. Get your tickets NOW and be a part of the Reverb community, where the music and memories will reverberate for years to come. Take your Reverb experience to the next level and spend an immersive weekend in our beautiful on-site campground, with camping options for everyone from car campers to full-size RV units. There's room for everyone!

Thank You to Our Campaign Sponsor

2024 Lineup

Friday, August 16, 2024

T.I., Ginuwine, Trick Daddy, Twista, Yung Joc, Mike Jones, Bubba Sparxxx, Ka Lia Universe, Pelly

Saturday, August 17, 2024

Yellowcard, Story Of The Year, Hawthorne Heights, Anberlin, Secondhand Serenade, Emery, Amber Pacific

Stay up to date on all things Reverb and other events in Eau Claire and sign up for our weekly e-newsletter!

Location

Reverb Music Festival takes place at the Eau Claire Event District at 5775 20th Ave. Eau Claire, WI. For more information, visit www.reverbwi.com.

Contact

You can reach Reverb Music Festival at 715-839-7500. Their office hours are Monday thru Friday from 8 AM - 5 PM and their office is located at 1711 S Hastings Way in Eau Claire.
